name: Pet Autonomy!
description:
[May take a moment to load after title]

Explore the world autonomously from your fish tank!  Use the arrows to move around and interact with things (in white). There are nine (9) endings. Made using Bitsy! 

Not for mobile but it may work on it if you move by dragging the tank around the house.

I wanted to test Bitsy out and based the game on the tank with wheels that moves according to the the fish's movement (image recognition by a webcam suspended above the tank) created by scientists who claim it could help pets be more autonomous.

Self driving goldfish tank by Studio Diip
